name: OVERHEAT (karteczqa)
description:
READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING

Hi guys and gals!

This is my simple game made for JUNE/JULY JACKPOT JAM.

Your task is watering flowers. You can take water from the well and store it in the barrel. Blue indicators show you irrigation of flowers. Job is done when flowers grow up. Move with "WSAD" or arrows, fill the barrel with "Space" and change temperature scale with "T". Speaking of temperature, when it's too high the well isn't working so store water wisely!

This is more like a one level prototype than "real game", but check it out!

(Only for Mac and Windows 64bit)
